column4: Good morning. I've been following the instructions in this blog post (http://blogs.forever.sg/2008/06/15/lcd-brightness-andubuntu-804-hardy/) about how to set my laptop's brightness. I'm having trouble with /etc/init.d/rc.local. There is no line reading exit 0
that's not the default /etc/rc.local .  Make sure you are looking at the right file
it looks like you pasted /etc/init.d/rc.local which is *not* the right one.  You want /etc/rc.local
